images.copyright: Milky Way above the Tre Cime di Lavaredo, South Tyrol, Italy (© Juan Romero/Cavan Images)
images.title: Peak stargazing
images.caption: The Tre Cime di Lavaredo, Italy
images.desc: This trio of peaks, known as the Tre Cime di Lavaredo, is located in the Sexten Dolomites of South Tyrol, Italy. The mountain group is one of the best-known in the Dolomites and tourists visit from all over the world to hike its trails. You'll enjoy a breathtaking view of the peaks from all angles and in the summer, you'll see a beautiful array of wildflowers. Make sure to plan ahead if you want to hike or camp under the moonlit sky and bring plenty of water and snacks. These peaks are part of the Dolomites World Heritage Site, which was designated in 2009.
